ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Survey - System standards and Performance
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Pro, 32 meg ... __________________________________________________ Do You Yahoo!? Get Yahoo! Mail - Free email you can access from anywhere!
ygData.messageBody:
> Computer Specs for Bards
>
> CPU: AMD K6-III 400
> RAM: 128M PC100
> Video Card (and RAM): Creative GeForce Anhilator
Pro, 32 meg

> Video Resolution: 640x480
> Sound Card: SIIG 128 PCI
> HD speed (rpm): 5800
> 'Net speed: 33.6
> Geographic Location: New York City
> Options enabled or disabled:
> Sky texturing: Single Layer
> Particle Effects: OFF
> Mip Mapping: OFF
> Clip plane distance: about 2/3
>
> How many songs can you twist? 3 (usually)
> Do you slow down when it rains? no
> How about in Unrest or Kunark? some video lag
